I am Annette, a product enthusiast and a student at the National University of Singapore. My academic journey in Economics and Communication and New Media has provided me with a unique lens through which I view the world of product management, UX design, and product design.

I am deeply passionate about the art of creating seamless, user-centric digital products and leveraging my analytical skills to enhance their impact. Join me on this journey as I explore the dynamic world of product development and design!
